CustomField.description: How to match the user profile name. If set to "Exact", the profile name must exactly match (this match is case-sensitive). If set to "Like", the profile name can have "%" characters to do wildcard matching similar to the SOQL LIKE operator (this match is case-insensitive). If set to "Regex", the profile name is an Apex regular expression (case sensitivity is controlled by the regular expression).
CustomField.label: Match Type
